relevant_findings.general: Very pleasant elderly gentleman, appears much younger than stated age, NAD
relevant_findings.HEENT: PERRL, EOMI, dry mucus membranes, no cervical or supraclavicular adenopathy
relevant_findings.CV: RRR, systolic murmur loudest at RUSB
relevant_findings.abdominal: soft, nondistended, hypoactive bowel sounds, slight TTP with deep palpation at epigastrium and RUQ, negative Murphy's sign
relevant_findings.neurological: A+O x3, gait WNL (while walking to BR), otherwise grossly intact
relevant_findings.psychological: very pleasant, interactive, appropriate, good insight
